description: A React component named NotesList that displays a list of note objects with functionalities to select, edit, and delete notes. It includes a truncate helper function to limit content preview length.

methods.name: truncate(text, max = 120)
methods.description: A helper function that shortens a given text to a maximum length, appending an ellipsis if truncated.

methods.name: NotesList({ notes, selectedId, onSelect, onDelete })
methods.description: A React functional component that renders a list of notes with options to select, edit, or delete each note.

ctags.name: NotesList
ctags.pattern: /^export default function NotesList({ notes, selectedId, onSelect, onDelete }) {$/
